name: npm-template-es2015-flow-jest
description: NPM Template with Flow and Jest

scripts.browser-dev: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -s projectName -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-flow-strip-types ] --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.browser-watch: mkdir -p dist && watchify src/index.js -v -o dist/browser.js -s projectName -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-flow-strip-types ] --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.browser: npm run browser-dev && uglifyjs dist/browser.js -o dist/browser.min.js -c
